<a id="ColorPickerButton"></a>

# ColorPickerButton

**Inherits:** [Button](Button.md) **\<** [BaseButton](BaseButton.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A button that brings up a [ColorPicker](ColorPicker.md) when pressed.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Encapsulates a [ColorPicker](ColorPicker.md), making it accessible by pressing a button. Pressing the button will toggle the [ColorPicker](ColorPicker.md)'s visibility.

See also [BaseButton](BaseButton.md) which contains common properties and methods associated with this node.

\ **Note:** By default, the button may not be wide enough for the color preview swatch to be visible. Make sure to set [Control.custom_minimum_size](Control.md#Control_property_custom_minimum_size) to a big enough value to give the button enough space.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [2D GD Paint Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2768)

- [GUI Drag And Drop Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2767)

<!-- classref-signal -->

**picker_created**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ColorPickerButton_signal_picker_created)

<!-- classref-signal -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="ColorPickerButton_property_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_pick_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_pick_color**\ (\ )

The currently selected color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPickerButton_property_edit_alpha"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **edit_alpha** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPickerButton_property_edit_alpha)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_edit_alpha**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_editing_alpha**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the alpha channel in the displayed [ColorPicker](ColorPicker.md) will be visible.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPickerButton_property_edit_intensity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **edit_intensity** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPickerButton_property_edit_intensity)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_edit_intensity**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_editing_intensity**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the intensity slider in the displayed [ColorPicker](ColorPicker.md) will be visible.

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="ColorPickerButton_method_get_picker"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[ColorPicker](ColorPicker.md) **get_picker**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ColorPickerButton_method_get_picker)

Returns the [ColorPicker](ColorPicker.md) that this node toggles.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [CanvasItem.visible](CanvasItem.md#CanvasItem_property_visible) property.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPickerButton_method_get_popup"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PopupPanel](PopupPanel.md) **get_popup**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ColorPickerButton_method_get_popup)

Returns the control's [PopupPanel](PopupPanel.md) which allows you to connect to popup signals. This allows you to handle events when the ColorPicker is shown or hidden.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [Window.visible](Window.md#Window_property_visible) property.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

<a id="ColorPickerButton_theme_icon_bg"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **bg** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPickerButton_theme_icon_bg)

The background of the color preview rect on the button.
